ohko_menu_desc: Change your One Hit Knock Out settings.
ohko_sub_reminder_desc: Enabled/disable or change the colour of the reminder.
ohko_enabled_desc: Enable/Disable One Hit Knock Out Mode.
ohko_reminder_desc: Enable/Disable if you want a reminder above the ready button, when OHKO is enabled.
ohko_custom_desc: Change what all you would like active when using OHKO.
ohko_debug_desc: This logs all the info in the console, if you don't know what are you doing then don't enable this
